data.name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance – HD Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1059340/Kingdom_Come_Deliverance__Festival_Suite/


About the Game

Please be sure you have version 1.4 of the game, the sounds will be updated automatically after download.

Enjoy the Kingdom Come: Deliverance with HD sounds now!
data.about_the_game:
Please be sure you have version 1.4 of the game, the sounds will be updated automatically after download.

Enjoy the Kingdom Come: Deliverance with HD sounds now!
data.short_description: HD Sounds Pack for Kingdom Come: Deliverance
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660, AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SOUND BLASTER Zx
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3,4 GHz, AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1060, AMD GPU Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SOUND BLASTER Zx
